Html: Can I use your library to manage the server not through rcon csgo and directly. For example to change the players on the team? Or call the event end of the round?

Hi,
Without rcon you can only fetch server information,player information and rules.
You can also get the logs if your address is present server's log address list.
To modify any setting of server,you will need rcon.
Thank you! Sorry, you have to mean decompile server, and look where these values are stored in memory. Either by using plug-ins. Thank you very much again.
